value: Hello valiant soldier. This is the 19th century and we are in the middle of the American Civil War. You fight on the side of the northern states, also called the Union, against the Confederate States of America to release the slaves. We are located near the Bull Run River and the southern troops are attacking us.
title: Abraham Lincoln:

value: But first I'll show you how to fight.
title: Abraham Lincoln:
